comment: If the image of the union of ` U ` and ` V ` is a subset of the union of ` U ` and ` V ` , ` A ` is an element of ` U ` and ` B ` follows ` A ` in the transitive closure of ` R ` , then ` B ` is an element of the union of ` U ` and ` V ` . Similar to Proposition 83 of [Frege1879] p. 65. Compare with ~ frege83 . (Contributed by RP, 15-Jul-2020.)
